title: Trump demands Supreme Court stop judges issuing injunctions
shortDescription: In a social media post, President Trump demanded the Supreme Court order lower court judges not to issue nationwide injunctions.

title: Trump to pay USAID bills, but fight to shut down agency continues
shortDescription: The Trump administration says it expects to finish paying about $671 million owed to foreign aid organizations for completed work Friday.

shortDescription: A group of eight Democratic Senators on Friday accused the Trump administration of abusing immigration laws in arresting student Mahmoud Khalil.

title: Why the 'kingdom of happiness' may get Trump travel ban

title: Trump officials propose plan revamping US foreign aid, memo says

title: What to know about Trump's order to dismantle Education Department
